## VM.sendMouseDownEvent() method

Sends a mousedown event to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendMouseDownEvent(button: MouseButton): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  button | [MouseButton](./vm-providers.mousebutton.md) | specifies which mouse button to press |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
